name: Environaut\Export\Export
short_desc: Default export that is used for reports after checks are run.
long_desc:
Outputs messages to the CLI and exports accumulated settings
 as JSON.

run.name: run
run.long_desc:
1. Display messages on CLI
 2. Run all formatters and display there text results on CLI

 If no formatters have been specified a JsonSettingsWriter will be used,
 that writes all settings to a JSON file.

setReport.name: setReport
setReport.short_desc: Set report to be handled by this exporter.

report.name: report
report.short_desc: report to be handled by the exporter

setCommand.name: setCommand
setCommand.short_desc: Environaut command for access to input and output.

setParameters.name: setParameters
setParameters.short_desc: Runtime parameters to configure the export operations.

DEFAULT_EXPORT_LOCATION.name: DEFAULT_EXPORT_LOCATION
DEFAULT_EXPORT_LOCATION.short_desc: Default filename to be used when no export file locations are specified.
